getExtremes

public double[] getExtremes()
Returns a two-element array containing this BufferedDataRaster's extreme scalar values, ignoring any values marked as missing-data. This returns null if this BufferedDataRaster contains no values, or if it contains only values marked as missing-data.

Returns:
a two-element array containing this BufferedDataRaster's extreme values, or null if none exist. Entry 0 contains the minimum value; entry 1 contains the maximum value.
